item.description:
Another way to support one another in healing and calling in higher energies for one and all -

Group members Susan Sloane and Mia Corinha are co-hosting a special group healing event to celebrate the fall season on 10-10-10.

We will circle around a fire, placed in the center (vortex) of a stone labyrinth, and mater healer and intuitive Susan Sloane will lead and facilitate a healing meditation. We will call in our Angelic Guides and release all that no longer serves us, or hinders our life experience, replacing it with golden-white, healing Light. This will be a powerful group experience of healing, and it's free!

(Free will donations gratefully accepted, not required)

Our hostess is Mia, co-founder of Labyrinth-Alchemy. Four Winds is a charming, warm, and high vibration private residence. The address will be sent about 24 hours in advance to those who have responded 'yes'.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Group Healing Ceremony
